Title: Finding Image Materials for Content Creation
Content: To find image materials for content creation, start by identifying benchmark posts on Xiaohongshu. For example, if you are creating content about bras, search for related posts and save high-quality images that showcase the product's features, such as size, material, and design. Use these images as a reference for your own content. Additionally, you can find more images by searching for similar products on e-commerce platforms like Taobao. Save images from the product's main page, detailed descriptions, and customer reviews. Ensure the images are clear and visually appealing. Avoid using low-quality or unattractive images, as they can negatively impact your content's effectiveness.

Title: Utilizing Video Materials for Content Creation
Content: To utilize video materials for content creation, search for relevant videos on platforms like Douyin. For instance, if you are creating content about phone cases, search for related videos and save those that are high-quality and engaging. Use these videos as a reference or directly incorporate them into your content. Ensure the videos are clear and visually appealing. Avoid using low-quality or irrelevant videos, as they can negatively impact your content's effectiveness. Additionally, you can use tools like 'Zhizunbao' to download videos from Xiaohongshu's comment sections. Always ensure to remove any watermarks and give proper credit if necessary.

Title: Finding and Using Original Content
Content: Finding and using original content is crucial for maintaining authenticity in your posts. Search for original content on platforms like Xiaohongshu and Douyin. Look for posts that are clearly created by the users themselves, rather than reposted or copied from other sources. Original content often includes unique perspectives, personal experiences, and high-quality visuals. When using original content, ensure to give proper credit to the creators. Additionally, you can create your own original content by taking high-quality photos and videos that showcase your product or service in a real-life context. This not only enhances the authenticity of your content but also helps build trust with your audience.
